rev.note: In my tests with Apollo I found that "document.compatMode" is undefined. If this code branch isn't taken then Apollo returns some strange values for d.body.clientHeight. So I added the check for "!d.compatMode ||". Since d.compatMode was not supported in IE5 I tested this in IE5 and it works fine because "d.documentElement" also does not exist in IE5. The same change was made in xClientWidth altho the only strange results were seen in xClientHeight.
